required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Interpretations and Predictions of Patient Reported Outcomes by Breast Cancer Patients
clinical_study.official_title: Interpretations and Predictions of Patient Reported Outcomes by Breast Cancer Patients

brief_summary.textblock: This study will assess how patients' long-term quality of life after different surgical approaches compares to their predicted quality of life.

detailed_description.textblock: This study will assess how patients' long-term quality of life after different surgical approaches compares to their predicted quality of life. It will also provide the research team with improved understanding of how patients interact with and prefer to receive QOL information. Improved understanding of patient predictions and perceptions of information display will allow us to incorporate predicted future PROs into the shared decision making process as well as allow us to provide this important information to patients in a meaningful way.

primary_outcome.measure: Predicted patient reported outcomes up to 1 year after
primary_outcome.description: Predicted patient reported outcomes for each domain six-months and 1 year after breast surgery.

primary_outcome.measure: Actual patient reported outcomes for each domain after surgery
primary_outcome.description: Actual PRO scores for each domain six-months after surgery
Comparison of predicted versus actual PRO scores in patients undergoing surgery

primary_outcome.measure: Patients preferred method of communicating results
primary_outcome.description: Patients' preferred means of receiving and communicating PRO results.

arm_group.description: Adult female patients newly diagnosed with stage 0-III breast cancer seen as a surgical consultation from 06/01/2019 to present.

study_pop.textblock: Pre-surgical breast cancer patients and breast cancer survivors

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Pre-surgical female breast cancer patients
- Female breast cancer survivors
Exclusion Criteria:
-
